CustomField.description: If this box is checked, your request will be automatically locked and routed to the credit team for approval. If unchecked, you will have to manually submit the request after saving.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, your request will be automatically locked and routed to the credit team for approval. If unchecked, you will have to manually submit the request after saving.
CustomField.label: Auto-Submit for Approval
